concept.title: Layouts
concept.shortdesc: Layout displays the results on a plotted page. You can create as many layouts as you need. Each layout is saved on its own layout tab and can be associated with a different page setup.

conbody.p: All the elements to be displayed on a plotted page, such as title blocks and notes, are drawn in paper space in a layout. The objects in the drawing are created in model space. To view these objects in the layout, you should create layout viewports.
